set.name: DMART-15 Fabulous Art: Terrific Drawing!! The Caricatures of Amazing Creatures

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your light creatures. ■ Parallel Invasion: When one of your non-psychic light commands attacks, you may put this creature from your hyperspatial zone onto it. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put a card from your hand into your hyperspatial zone, then tap all your opponent's creatures that have the highest power. At the start of your opponent's next turn, they don't untap.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-15 Fabulous Art: Terrific Drawing!! The Caricatures of Amazing Creatures

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Parallel Revolution Change: When one of your non-psychic water or darkness dragons that cost 5 or more attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature in your hyperspatial zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand. ■ Whenever you discard from your hand, each of your other multicolored creatures gets "slayer" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-15 Fabulous Art: Terrific Drawing!! The Caricatures of Amazing Creatures

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this dragheart into the battle zone or whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may put a nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 20 or more, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-15 Fabulous Art: Terrific Drawing!! The Caricatures of Amazing Creatures

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you summon a creature from your hand, you may put a nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 30 or more, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you summon a creature from your hand or whenever this creature attacks, you may put a nature creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each player puts all their cards in the battle zone, hand, shield zone and graveyard into their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-15 Fabulous Art: Terrific Drawing!! The Caricatures of Amazing Creatures

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 3 cards. Then put 2 cards from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck in any order. {LAST BURST} (When this creature is destroyed, you may cast its spell side for no cost.) TWINPACT {STRIKE BACK}-Outrage (When a Outrage card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Outrage Mechraid 8.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 3 cards. Then put 2 cards from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck in any order. {LAST BURST} (When this creature is destroyed, you may cast its spell side for no cost.)

property.value: {STRIKE BACK}-Outrage (When a Outrage card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Outrage Mechraid 8.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-15 Fabulous Art: Terrific Drawing!! The Caricatures of Amazing Creatures

card.name: Glenglassaugh, Next Generation Dragon Ruler / "Leave this to me, big sister!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 2 or less. Then put a fire dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures. ■ If you have 2 or more dragons or draguners, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 2 or less. Then put a fire dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures. ■ If you have 2 or more dragons or draguners, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.
